Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-la
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: wo zai na gaogui de yejian que yi jiang shi ta
ni zen neng zhidao na gaogui de yejian shi shenme
na gaogui de yejian, shengguo yiqian ge yue
zhong tianshen he jingshen, feng tamen de zhu de mingling, wei yiqie shiwu er zai na yejian jianglin
na yejian quan shi ping'an di, zhidao liming xianzhu de shi hou
